00052             function                __construct()
00053             {
00054                   try
00055                   {
00056                         $this->PermitAccess = get_package( 'permit::permit_access' , 'last' , __FILE__ );

00058                         $this->Security = get_package( 'security' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00059                   }

00063                   }

00084             function                set_permit( $Options )
00085             {
00086                   try
00087                   {
00088                         $Permit = $this->Security->get_gp( 'permit' , 'command' );
00089                         $MasterType = $this->Security->get_gp( 'master_type' , 'command' );
00090                         
00091                         if( $this->Security->get_gp( 'ids' , 'set' ) )
00092                         {
00093                               $MasterId = explode( ',' , $this->Security->get_gp( 'ids' , 'string' ) );
00094                         }
00095                         else
00096                         {
00097                               $MasterId = array( $this->Security->get_gp( 'master_id' , 'integer' ) );
00098                         }
00099 
00100                         $this->PermitAccess->set_permit_for_object( $Permit , $MasterId , $MasterType );
00101                   }
00102                   catch( Exception $e )
00103                   {
00104                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00105                   }
00106             }
00107

00210             function                on_after_delete_page( $Parameters )
00211             {
00212                   try
00213                   {
00214                         $Object = $this->Security->get( get_field( $Parameters , 'page_name' ) , 'command' );
00215 
00216                         $this->PermitAccess->delete_permits_for_page( $Object );
00217                   }

00242             function                controller( $Options )
00243             {
00244                   try
00245                   {
00246                         $ContextSet = get_package_object( 'gui::context_set' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00247                         
00248                         $ContextSet->add_context( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_set_permit' );
00249                         
00250                         $ContextSet->add_context( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_delete_permit' );
00251                         
00252                         $ContextSet->add_context( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_toggle_permit' );
00253                         
00254                         $ContextSet->execute( $Options , $this , __FILE__ );
00255                   }
00256                   catch( Exception $e )
00257                   {
00258                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
